featured.text: In the keen competition of this international tennis tournament, she ________ won the championship.

definition.zh_def: 比賽，通常是多個參賽者或團隊之間進行的競賽，通常有獎勵或榮譽。
definition.en_def: A competition involving multiple participants or teams, often with prizes or honors awarded.
definition.example: The chess tournament attracted players from all over the country.
